CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 6, 1954, pg. 3, reads: "Laboratory Technician - Eugene Howard Smith, 36, of Sharon (pictured in center), listens with Lewis Hull (right side of picture) as Dr. Albert Martin, bacteriologist at the Veterans Neuropsychiatric Hospital at Leech's Farm, explains a working technique. Smith was reecently [sic] appointed to the position after passing a stiff examination.  He is to assist in performing autopsies. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Dr. Albert Martin holding graduated cylinder, speaking to Eugene Howard Smith and Lewis Hull, standing in lab at Veterans Neuropsychiatric Hospital at Leech Farm
